newsitem.title: USA: Cargill hopeful N.Korea deal leads to more sales.
newsitem.headline: Cargill hopeful N.Korea deal leads to more sales.

text.p: A Cargill Inc. official said Monday that the company is hopeful that the deal just concluded to sell U.S. wheat to North Korea will lead to more grain sales to the famine-stricken nation.
"We'll see ... We certainly hope so," Cargill spokeswoman Lori Johnson said when asked if the deal would lead to further grain sales.
Johnson told Reuters that the company is concentrating on completing the transaction with North Korea and that company is continuing its communication with officials in Pyongyang.
